response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us, but given its importance to you, we aim to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. We are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a 10% discount off its original value, making it an exceptional deal. We believe this pricing reflects the mutual benefit and exclusivity of this offer. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10800}
